description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is 52 min of Bernina Software 7, and the second course of 36 courses where we will explain the workings of Bernina Software 7.

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 36 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software.

Please feel free to try class 2 of 36 and then come join us for the other classes in this series.
title: #03: Bernina Software 7: How to Set Up your Screen Settings
